thread.title: Goalkeeper went to bar during half against Arsenal
thread.title_full: Goalkeeper went to bar during half against Arsenal

title: Goalkeeper went to bar during half against Arsenal
text:
Goalkeeper went to bar during half against Arsenal Legend. Post to Facebook Goalkeeper went to bar during half against Arsenal Legend.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/sutton-reserve-goalkeeper-wayne-shaw-bar-halftime-fa-cup-arsenal-pie/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Goalkeeper went to bar during half against Arsenal Andrew Joseph 5:13   
Sutton United's English goalkeeper Wayne Shaw (C) applauds supporters on the picth after the English FA Cup fifth round football match between Sutton United and Arsenal at the Borough Sports Ground, Gander Green Lane in south London on February 20, 2017. Arsenal won the game 2-0. (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) 
Sutton United FC, a fifth-tier English soccer club, incredibly reached the fifth round of the FA Cup and hosted Premier League power Arsenal at Gander Green Lane in South London on Monday. 
Arsenal won, 2-0, but the biggest star of the match didn't even play. 
Sutton's backup keeper is Wayne Shaw. The 46-year-old really made the most of this rare matchup with a Premier League club. He was seen vacuuming the dugouts before the match . 
But even better, BBC's Chris Slegg spotted Shaw at the stadium bar during halftime. I kid you not. Sutton reserve keeper Wayne Shaw is in the bar at half-time. pic.twitter.com/f7014pXRBP ‚Äî Chris Slegg (@ChrisSlegg) February 20, 2017 
Shaw later enjoyed a pie on the bench during the second half. Slow-motion replay and all. LEGEND: @SuttonUnited goalkeeper Wayne Shaw tucking into a pie on the bench vs Arsenal. üòÇüëè
